description.zh-cn: 中国企业家和政治人物，曾任中华人民共和国副主席，被称为“红色资本家”。
description.en: Chinese entrepreneur and politician, former Vice President of the People's Republic of China, known as the 'Red Capitalist'.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国副主席

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国副主席
en: Vice President of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的国家副元首。
description.en: The deputy head of state of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的领导人之一，荣毅仁的前任中华人民共和国副主席。
description.en: One of the leaders of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, predecessor of Rong Yiren as Vice President of the PRC.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国前主要领导人，接替荣毅仁担任中华人民共和国副主席。
description.en: Former paramount leader of the People's Republic of China, who succeeded Rong Yiren as Vice President of the PRC.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国前主要领导人，在荣毅仁担任国家副主席期间任国家主席。
description.en: Former paramount leader of the People's Republic of China, who was the President during Rong Yiren's term as Vice President.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的八个民主党派之一。
description.en: One of the eight legally recognized political parties in the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

location.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国江苏省
location.en: Jiangsu Province, People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 荣毅仁的夫人。
description.en: Spouse of Rong Yiren.

description.zh-cn: 荣毅仁之子，香港企业家，中信泰富有限公司前主席。
description.en: Son of Rong Yiren, a Hong Kong entrepreneur and former chairman of CITIC Pacific Ltd.

description.zh-cn: 中国近代著名的民族资本家，荣毅仁之父。
description.en: A famous national capitalist in modern China, father of Rong Yiren.

description.zh-cn: 1879年至1952年间在中国上海的一所大学，荣毅仁曾于此就读。
description.en: A university in Shanghai, China, that existed from 1879 to 1952. Rong Yiren was an alumnus.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国公务员体系中的最高级别。
description.en: The highest level in the civil service system of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 对在中国共产党和中华人民共和国政治体系中担任重要领导职务的官员的统称。
description.en: A collective term for officials holding major leadership positions in the political system of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 荣氏家族企业之一，荣毅仁曾在此任职。
description.en: One of the Rong family's enterprises, where Rong Yiren once worked.

description.zh-cn: 荣毅仁曾担任董事的公司。
description.en: A company where Rong Yiren served as a director.

description.zh-cn: 荣毅仁曾担任董事和经理的银行。
description.en: A bank where Rong Yiren served as a director and manager.

en: East China Military and Administrative Committee

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国成立初期的大区行政机构之一。
description.en: One of the regional administrative bodies in the early days of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 1950年代中华人民共和国针对民族资本家的一项社会主义改造政策，导致荣毅仁等人的资产被国有化。
description.en: A socialist transformation policy targeting national capitalists in the People's Republic of China in the 1950s, which led to the nationalization of assets of individuals like Rong Yiren.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国上海市的地方国家行政机关。
description.en: The local state administrative organ of Shanghai, People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国纺织工业部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国纺织工业部
en: Ministry of Textile Industry of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 曾是中华人民共和国国务院下属的负责纺织工业的部门。
description.en: A former ministry under the State Council of the People's Republic of China responsible for the textile industry.

en: Vice Chairman of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会的副职领导人。
description.en: The deputy leader of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

nodes.id: 中国国际信托投资公司

zh-cn: 中国国际信托投资公司
en: China International Trust and Investment Corporation

description.zh-cn: 由荣毅仁于1979年创办的国有大型跨国企业集团，简称中信集团。
description.en: A large state-owned multinational conglomerate founded by Rong Yiren in 1979, also known as CITIC Group.

description.zh-cn: 以中华人民共和国名誉主席宋庆龄命名的基金会，荣毅仁曾任副主席。
description.en: A foundation named after Soong Ching-ling, the honorary president of the People's Republic of China. Rong Yiren served as its vice chairman.

nodes.id: 香港特别行政区基本法起草委员会

zh-cn: 香港特别行政区基本法起草委员会
en: Hong Kong Basic Law Drafting Committee

description.zh-cn: 负责起草《中华人民共和国香港特别行政区基本法》的机构。
description.en: The body responsible for drafting the Basic Law of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国广州市的一所大学，荣毅仁曾任其校董会董事长。
description.en: A university located in Guangzhou, China, where Rong Yiren served as the chairman of its board of directors.

nodes.id: 全国人大常委会副委员长

zh-cn: 全国人大常委会副委员长
en: Vice Chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 全国人民代表大会常务委员会的副职领导人。
description.en: The deputy leader of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress.

nodes.id: 中华全国工商业联合会

zh-cn: 中华全国工商业联合会
en: All-China Federation of Industry and Commerce

description.zh-cn: 中国工商界组成的人民团体和商会组织。
description.en: A people's organization and chamber of commerce composed of figures from the industrial and commercial circles in China.

en: Association for Relations Across the Taiwan Straits

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国处理与台湾海峡对岸事务的半官方机构。
description.en: A semi-official organization in the People's Republic of China for handling affairs with the other side of the Taiwan Strait.

description.zh-cn: 中国的全国性扶贫公益组织，荣毅仁曾任荣誉会长。
description.en: A national poverty alleviation and public welfare organization in China, where Rong Yiren served as honorary chairman.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国元帅，曾任上海市市长、国务院副总理，将荣毅仁誉为“红色资本家”。
description.en: A Marshal of the People's Republic of China, former Mayor of Shanghai and Vice Premier of the State Council, who praised Rong Yiren as a 'Red Capitalist'.

description.zh-cn: 中国近代著名的民族资本家，荣毅仁的伯父。
description.en: A famous national capitalist in modern China, uncle of Rong Yiren.

description.zh-cn: 总部位于香港的上市公司，荣毅仁之子荣智健曾任主席。
description.en: A publicly listed company headquartered in Hong Kong, formerly chaired by Rong Yiren's son, Rong Zhijian.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾任台湾省政府主席，是荣毅仁的妹夫。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China, former Chairman of the Taiwan Provincial Government, and brother-in-law of Rong Yiren.

description.zh-cn: 澳门商人和政治人物，是荣毅仁的姻亲。
description.en: A Macanese businessman and politician, who was a relative of Rong Yiren by marriage.

description.zh-cn: 荣毅仁的姻亲。
description.en: A relative of Rong Yiren by marriage.

description.zh-cn: 发源于江苏无锡的著名工商家族，荣毅仁是其重要成员。
description.en: A famous industrial and commercial family originating from Wuxi, Jiangsu, of which Rong Yiren was a prominent member.

description.zh-cn: 接替荣毅仁担任中国国际信托投资公司董事长的政治人物。
description.en: A political figure who succeeded Rong Yiren as Chairman of China International Trust and Investment Corporation.

description.zh-cn: 接替荣毅仁担任中国国际信托投资公司总经理的政治人物。
description.en: A political figure who succeeded Rong Yiren as General Manager of China International Trust and Investment Corporation.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的领导人之一，荣毅仁的前任暨南大学校董会董事长。
description.en: One of the leaders of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, predecessor of Rong Yiren as Chairman of the Board of Directors of Jinan University.

description.zh-cn: 中国科学家、教育家，接替荣毅仁担任暨南大学校董会董事长。
description.en: A Chinese scientist and educator who succeeded Rong Yiren as Chairman of the Board of Directors of Jinan University.

en: China Council for the Promotion of Peaceful National Reunification

description.zh-cn: 以“促进中国的和平统一”为宗旨的中国人民团体。
description.en: A Chinese people's organization with the purpose of 'promoting the peaceful reunification of China'.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国副主席

description.zh-cn: 荣毅仁担任中华人民共和国副主席。
description.en: Rong Yiren served as the Vice President of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 荣毅仁接替王震出任中华人民共和国副主席。
description.en: Rong Yiren succeeded Wang Zhen as Vice President of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 胡锦涛接替荣毅仁出任中华人民共和国副主席。
description.en: Hu Jintao succeeded Rong Yiren as Vice President of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 荣毅仁在担任国家副主席期间，江泽民是国家主席。
description.en: During Rong Yiren's term as Vice President, Jiang Zemin was the President.

description.zh-cn: 荣毅仁是中国民主建国会会员。
description.en: Rong Yiren was a member of the China Democratic National Construction Association.

description.zh-cn: 荣毅仁于1985年秘密加入中国共产党。
description.en: Rong Yiren secretly joined the Communist Party of China in 1985.

position.en: Member of the Finance and Economic Committee

description.zh-cn: 1956年“公私合营”之后，荣毅仁的所有资产皆被国有化。
description.en: After the 'public-private partnership' policy in 1956, all of Rong Yiren's assets were nationalized.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国纺织工业部
中国国际信托投资公司
中国国际信托投资公司
香港特别行政区基本法起草委员会

position.en: Chairman of the Board of Directors

relationships.target: 全国人大常委会副委员长
中华全国工商业联合会

description.zh-cn: 1957年，时任副总理的陈毅将荣毅仁誉为“红色资本家”。
description.en: In 1957, then Vice Premier Chen Yi praised Rong Yiren as a 'Red Capitalist'.

description.zh-cn: 荣宗敬是荣毅仁的伯父。
description.en: Rong Zongjing was Rong Yiren's uncle.

description.zh-cn: 魏道明是荣毅仁的妹夫。
description.en: Wei Tao-ming was Rong Yiren's brother-in-law.

description.zh-cn: 马万祺是荣毅仁的姻亲。
description.en: Ma Man-kei was a relative of Rong Yiren by marriage.

description.zh-cn: 任士刚是荣毅仁的姻亲。
description.en: Ren Shigang was a relative of Rong Yiren by marriage.

description.zh-cn: 魏鸣一接替荣毅仁出任中国国际信托投资公司董事长。
description.en: Wei Mingyi succeeded Rong Yiren as Chairman of China International Trust and Investment Corporation.

description.zh-cn: 王军接替荣毅仁出任中国国际信托投资公司总经理。
description.en: Wang Jun succeeded Rong Yiren as General Manager of China International Trust and Investment Corporation.

description.zh-cn: 荣毅仁接替廖承志出任暨南大学校董会董事长。
description.en: Rong Yiren succeeded Liao Chengzhi as Chairman of the Board of Directors of Jinan University.

description.zh-cn: 钱伟长接替荣毅仁出任暨南大学校董会董事长。
description.en: Qian Weichang succeeded Rong Yiren as Chairman of the Board of Directors of Jinan University.
